titles.title: Providing for a joint session of Congress to receive a message from the President.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 1/24/2008--Passed Senate without amendment. Declares that the two Houses of Congress shall assemble in the Hall of the House of Representatives on Monday, January 28, 2008, at 9 p.m., for the purpose of receiving (the State of the Union Address from) the President of the United States.
